mapper.sql:
FROM infrCode a JOIN infrCodeGroup b on a.infrCodeGroup_cgSeq = b.cgSeq WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.cdSeq AND a.cdDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND a.cdSeq = #{shValue} AND a.cdName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue},'%')
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM infrCode a WHERE 1=1 AND cdSeq = #{cdSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE infrCode SET cdDelNy=1 WHERE cdSeq=#{cdSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT cdSeq ,cdName ,infrCodeGroup_cgSeq as cgSeq FROM infrCode WHERE 1=1 AND cdDelNy = 0 AND cdUseNy = 1
SELECT cgSeq ,cgName FROM infrCodeGroup WHERE 1=1 AND cgUseNy = 1
